alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 12 at 12:21PM CST until January 12 at 12:45PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Western Greene County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 145 PM EST. * At 121 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Baneberry, or near Dandridge, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... White Pine around 130 PM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lowland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 422 and 428. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 15. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
